query:
SELECT
            id,
            slug,
            name,
            description,
            ts_rank(
                to_tsvector('english', name || ' ' || COALESCE(description, '')),
                plainto_tsquery('english', $1)
            ) as "rank!"
        FROM organizations
        WHERE to_tsvector('english', name || ' ' || COALESCE(description, ''))
            @@ plainto_tsquery('english', $1)
        ORDER BY 5 DESC, created_at DESC
        LIMIT $2
